text: <@U2H3TT8F2> I discovered that it happens when I try to view the live example from my portal ID...it's not one particular template...but every product I view from my account redirects me to the login page
Hello all!!! Just a quick question to ask-: Can we not install a product from asset marketplace from the same portal id on which it was created?
<@U013PPTC18S> would you be able to file a support request in-app regarding this? Feel free to DM the ticket request number you get back and I can follow along with it internally.
do you have the ability to create test accounts? if this is for testing, test accounts work great.

Thanks <@U022H3A7JNM>. Yes I can manage to create a test account but I wanted to know that is there no other option apart from it to install the product. As you can see in the attached screenshot it denies the installation, Does HubSpot now restricts to install the product directly from marketplace from the portal on which it was created.
Yes <@U2H3TT8F2> I could do that. Thank you
